description: Examines selective unjust enrichment claims. Topics include mistaken transactions; misdirected payments; claims arising out of ineffective, incomplete or failed contracts; benefits obtained by improper coercion; disgorgement of the profits of wrongdoing; defences and proprietary remedies for unjust enrichment.
restricted: LLB(Hons)(#64), LLB(Hons)(#48), LLB (Graduate Entry), LLB(Hons) duals and LLB dual programs.
